mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan_participants (plan_id, user_id, created_at) VALUES (#{planId}, #{userId}, NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE deleted_at = NULL, updated_at = NOW()
mapper.update: UPDATE plan_participants SET deleted_at = NOW() WHERE plan_id = #{planId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT u.* FROM users u INNER JOIN plan_participants pp ON u.id = pp.user_id WHERE pp.plan_id = #{planId} AND pp.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY u.id
